amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to prohibit export or sale of petroleum products from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to China, North Korea, Russia, Iran or any country subject to sanctions imposed by the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Houlahan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
